channel.title: [PI] Running [PI]
channel.description: Ok, i just downloaded a base and the running is fked up, it looks like they are running in slow motion, can someone please help me fix this? I want it to be smooth.

item.title: [PI] Running [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

when i run my source it says “run 800m”

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Running [PI]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

It could be that the source has been programmed so poorly that it ends up taking more then 600ms to process the player. Or you never know it could be client side.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Running [PI]
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:3, topic:515907”][quote author=Free Sosa link=topic=634161.msg4282458#msg4282458 date=1365883075]
Get a new source. Or, that emote is bugged. Download another source and take that running emote info and copy + paste.
[/quote]
so helpful lol, does someone have a ‘real’ answer?[/quote]

Try a different client or get a new source.

Read full topic
